name: rescue-quick
description: Severe flooding is a recurring crisis in the country, leaving countless individuals stranded and faced with the challenge of contacting the proper agencies for rescuing. Calling for rescue is often difficult due to different factors, such as network outages, overwhelming volumes of people loading emergency hotlines, and the desperate fight for survival.

scripts.dev: npx concurrently -c "#b4ff65,#93c5fd" "npm run dev:django" "npm run dev:tailwind" --names=django,tailwind
scripts.build: npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:static
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ruff && npm run lint:djlint
scripts.fmt: npm run fmt:ruff && npm run fmt:djlint
scripts.fmt:fix: npx concurrently -c "#fdba74,#b4ff65" "npm run fmt:ruff:fix" "npm run fmt:djlint:fix" --names=ruff,djlint
scripts.build:static: uv run manage.py collectstatic --no-input -i input.css -i django-browser-reload
